item.title: How To Communicate Over Text
item.description: There are a few social ettique things that people sometimes handle incorrectly over text, much to the detrimant of their own relationships. After dealing with these so many times, I thought maybe having a source to point to that says “Not only does this bother me, but it’s bothered me enough, historically, that I’ve written exactly how, why, and how to avoid it” might help. Rule 1: No anxious cliffhangers # we need to talk 1:12 PM Why?
